reviews.review_msg: Efe was one of my favourite professors this semester! He explained all class concepts clearly with PowerPoints, but wrote some extra stuff on the whiteboard (his writing was a little messy). Heavy on the reading with three-four academic articles per week; tests focus on these readings a lot. Followed lecture with a modern video. I liked the class!
You can tell he really makes an effort. There is lots of readings, but he did however make 3 hour lecture bearable by including modern content and movies.
